full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL YE SHES KYI 'KHOR 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI BDAG MDUN BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL BSGRAL LAS GTOR BZLOG DANG BCAS PA'I RNAM BZHAG MKHA' 'GRO'I DGOS RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @025A *, ,(CES DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI BDAG MDUN BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL BSGRAL LAS GTOR BZLOG DANG BCAS PA'I RNAM BZHAG MKHA' 'GRO'I DGOS RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA SOR GZHUNG LUGS DU LMA SPOBS PA MCHOG TU DGE BA RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG SHES RAB KYIS BSKUL TE HAR CHEN THU MED KYI SA CHAR GSAR RTZOM BGYIS PA ZHIG LOD KYANG DER BSGRAL KYI RIMS MA TSANG BAR BRTEN PHYIS SU MDZOD DGE STOD NAS DON GNYER BA 'GA' ZHIG GIS CHA CHANG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SNGA MA LA BSGYUR 'GOD PHRAN BU DANG, ,KHA SBYOR DBYE BA'I SKOR YANG KHA BSKANG STE, ,BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIG MED DBANG POS GA-YAR KHRAL DU SBYAR BA DGE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
